title: Remove multicolor gradient text from images

requirements.summary: Remove multicolor gradient text styling from all text elements that appear over or within image content across the Home page hero section carousel
acceptanceCriteria: Text overlaid on hero carousel images renders in solid colors without gradient effects
Hero section headings and CTA button text remain fully visible and readable over background images
Gradient text effects are preserved for non-image sections of the page

file_operations.description: Remove gradient text classes (bg-gradient-to-r, from-*, via-*, to-*, bg-clip-text, text-transparent) from all text elements within the hero carousel sections that overlay the hero slide images (hero-slide-1.dim_1920x800.png, hero-slide-2.dim_1920x800.png, hero-slide-3.dim_1920x800.png). Replace with solid color classes (text-white or text-gray-900) with appropriate drop shadows or backgrounds for contrast and readability. Preserve gradient styling on any text rendered over solid background sections outside the carousel.

requirements.summary: Remove multicolor gradient text styling from any text overlays on the Healthcare Support System page video thumbnail sections
acceptanceCriteria: Text overlaid on video thumbnails or image placeholders renders in solid colors
All text over visual media remains clearly visible without gradient styling

file_operations.description: Remove gradient text classes (bg-gradient-to-r, from-*, via-*, to-*, bg-clip-text, text-transparent) from any text elements that overlay the video thumbnail images (healthcare-video-thumbnail-1.dim_800x450.png, healthcare-video-thumbnail-2.dim_800x450.png, healthcare-video-thumbnail-3.dim_800x450.png, healthcare-video-thumbnail-4.dim_800x450.png). Replace with solid color classes (text-white with drop shadow or semi-transparent background overlay) to ensure readability. Preserve gradient styling on text rendered over solid backgrounds in the category cards and other non-image sections.

requirements.summary: Ensure multicolor gradient typography is only applied to text rendered directly on solid background colors, not on text overlaying images, photos, or video content across all pages
acceptanceCriteria: Text on solid backgrounds displays with multicolor gradients as designed
Text over images, carousels, or media content displays in solid colors with high contrast
Visual hierarchy and readability are maintained across all page sections

file_operations.description: Review all text elements on the page. Remove gradient text classes from any text that overlays images (such as healthcare-team.dim_800x600.png, hospital-building.dim_800x600.png, or any stakeholder images). Replace with solid colors that maintain readability. Preserve gradient styling on headings and text over solid background sections (hero sections, card backgrounds).

Review the onboarding animation flow. If any text overlays images during the stakeholder approval animations (ambulance-happy.dim_256x256.png, doctor-peaceful.dim_256x256.png, hospital-happy.dim_256x256.png, ngo-peaceful.dim_256x256.png, nurse-happy.dim_256x256.png, vendor-content.dim_256x256.png), remove gradient text classes and replace with solid colors for clarity. Preserve gradient styling on text over solid backgrounds.

Review all text elements on the Solutions page. If any text overlays the icon images (rcm-icon.dim_256x256.png, tech-icon.dim_256x256.png, network-icon.dim_256x256.png), remove gradient text classes and replace with solid colors. Preserve gradient styling on section headings and text over solid background cards.

Review text overlaying the world map background image (world-map-bg.dim_1200x600.png). Remove any gradient text classes from text elements that appear over the map image and replace with solid colors (text-white with drop shadow or semi-transparent background). Preserve gradient styling on statistics or labels rendered over solid backgrounds.
